Rulings.Edison:
●If this card is destroyed by battle, the ② stops applying in Substep 6 ("Tragoedia"'s effect can't be activated).
● The ① will destroy Special Summoned monsters that were flipped face-down (eg by Book of Moon), even if they were Flip Summoned after, or banished temporarily (eg by Interdimensional Matter Transporter).
Rulings.Tengu:
(1) Neither player can Special Summon monsters. (2) When this card is flipped face-up, destroy all Special Summoned monsters on the field.
●The (1) Continuous Effect applies while this card is face-up.
●Monsters cannot be Special Summoned face-down (by Super-Nimble Mega Hamster).
●The (2) mandatory Trigger Effect cannot miss the timing.
●If this face-down card is attacked, this effect activates in Substep 6 - Resolve Effects.
●This effect destroys monsters Special Summoned face-down (by Super-Nimble Mega Hamster).
●This effect destroys Special Summoned monsters that were flipped face-down (by Book of Moon).

Rulings.Cat:
● Monsters that are Special Summoned face-down, or flipped face-down after being Special Summoned, will be destroyed by 'Fossil Dyna Pachycephalo's' second effect.
● 'Fossil Dyna Pachycephalo's' first effect is a Continuous Effect. Its second effect is a Trigger Effect.
Rulings.TeleDAD:
● Monsters that are Special Summoned face-down, or flipped face-down after being Special Summoned, will be destroyed by 'Fossil Dyna Pachycephalo's' second effect.
● 'Fossil Dyna Pachycephalo's' first effect is a Continuous Effect. Its second effect is a Trigger Effect.

Rulings.Base: 1. Monsters that are Special Summoned face-down, or flipped face-down after being Special Summoned, will be destroyed by the second effect of "Fossil Dyna Pachycephalo".\n2. The first effect of "Fossil Dyna Pachycephalo" is a Continuous Effect. Its second effect is a Trigger Effect.\n3. [FORUM] If the effect of "Fossil Dyna Pachycephalo" is being negated by "Effect Veiler", you can then activate cards like "Call of the Haunted" to Special Summon a monster.

PSCT.Edison: ① If this card is flipped face-up: Destroy all Special Summoned monsters on the field. ② Neither player can attempt to Special Summon monsters.
